description: The Kazama Family is a group of friends led by its namesake, http://anidb.net/ch27361 [Kazama Shouichi]. Feared for the fighting prowess of its ranks, which boast several of the strongest Kawakami City residents and most notably world-class fighter and womanizer extraordinaire http://anidb.net/ch27353 [Kawakami Momoyo], the group is also renowned for the tactics of its brain, http://anidb.net/ch27357 [Naoe Yamato].
name: Kazama Family
